 Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version.)  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
statement:
rexlimiv.1 $e |- ( x e. A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
rexlimiv $p |- ( E. x e. A ph -> ps ) $.
$d ps x $.
